data.title: Getting Started with Next.js
data.meta_description: A comprehensive guide to starting with Next.js
data.content:
Next.js is a powerful React framework that enables you to build fast, SEO-friendly web applications with ease.

In this tutorial, we'll explore the basics of Next.js and learn how to create your first application. Next.js provides features like server-side rendering, static site generation, and API routes out of the box.

data.title: Mastering Three.js for Web
data.meta_description: Learn how to create stunning 3D graphics on the web
data.content:
Three.js makes it easy to create and display animated 3D computer graphics in a web browser using WebGL.

This powerful library abstracts away the complexity of WebGL and provides an intuitive API for creating 3D scenes, lights, cameras, and animations.
